trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of XML schemas.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class.
Adds an object to the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object to be added to the collection of objects.
The index at which the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> is added.
Adds an instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class to the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> object to be added to the end of the collection.
Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> to add.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> of the schema object.
The index at which the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> is added.
Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> to add.
Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.
The following list identifies situations in which the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method is called:

By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

By the Wsdl.exe tool or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies.
Instead of calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.

A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> that specifies the callback method that handles errors and warnings during XML Schema validation, if the strict parameter is set to `true`.

`true` to validate the XML schemas in the collection using the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile(System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler,System.Boolean)"></xref> method of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that belongs to the specified namespace.
The namespace of the item to check for.
`true` if the item is found; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> contains a specific schema.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object to locate.
`true`, if the collection contains the specified item; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, which starts at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the schemas copied from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the array where copying begins.
Locates in one of the XML schemas an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> of the specified name and type.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> that specifies a fully qualified name with a namespace used to locate an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the object to find.

Possible types include: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.
Gets a collection of schemas that belong to the same namespace.
The method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
The namespace of the schemas to retrieve.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> implementation that contains the schemas.
Searches for the specified schema and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> to locate.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
Inserts a schema into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which schema should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object to be inserted.
Gets a value that indicates whether the schemas have been compiled.
You can compile the schemas referenced in a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas> object by invoking the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method.
`true`, if the schemas have been compiled; otherwise, `false`.
Static method that determines whether the specified XML schema contains a custom `IsDataSet` attribute set to `true`, or its equivalent.
The `IsDataSet` attribute comes from the namespace `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata`.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.IsDataSet%2A> method is called by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure and does not need to be called directly.
The XML schema to check for an `IsDataSet` attribute with a `true` value.
`true` if the specified schema exists; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object at the specified index.
The index of the item to retrieve.
The specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref>.
Gets a specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that represents the XML schema associated with the specified namespace.
The namespace of the specified object.
The specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object.
Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which to insert value.
The new value of the element at index.
Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which value can be found.
The value of the element to remove at index.
Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
The zero-based index at which oldValue can be found.
The value to replace with newValue.
The new value of the element at index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific schema from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> to remove.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection of XML schemas.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
